name: web-scraper
description: Web scraping and content extraction via provider client. Fetch pages, extract text, links, metadata, structured data, and HTML tables using cheerio-based approach. Layer 1 skill using provider client for web access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: web-scraper
toolDefinition.description: Web scraping and content extraction via provider client. Fetch pages, extract text, links, metadata, structured data, and HTML tables. Layer 1 skill using provider client (BYOK). URL allowlist enforced.

action.description: fetch_page (fetch HTML content), extract_text (extract text content), extract_links (extract all links), extract_metadata (extract page metadata), extract_structured (extract data using CSS selectors), extract_tables (extract HTML tables)

url.description: Target URL (must be http:// or https://). Required for all actions.

headers.description: Custom HTTP headers for fetch_page action. Optional.

selector.description: CSS selector to target specific element (max 500 chars). Used with extract_text action.

limit.description: Maximum number of links to return (1-500, default 100). Used with extract_links action.

selectors.description: Array of { name, selector, attribute? } objects for structured extraction (max 50). Used with extract_structured action.

tableIndex.description: Index of the table to extract (default 0). Used with extract_tables action.
